delete_trip_confirmation_message: Are you sure want to delete this trip?
select_default_vehicle: How do you normally travel to work?
delete_vehicle_confirmation_message: Are you sure want to delete this vehicle?
train_station_question: Which train station do you usually travel from when going to work?
train_station_toggle_text: I never take the train to work
download_app_details: Did you know we also have a mobile app? Click below to download the  app!
work_from_home_suggestion: You can now click on all days you worked from home; click the day again to deselect work from home.
work_from_office_suggestion: You can now click on all days you worked from the office; click the day again to deselect work from office.
invalid_email: Invalid email address. Check your e-mail address for errors and try again.
password_length: Password length must be at least 8 characters
invalid_license_plate: License plate not recognized. Please add a valid Dutch license plate.
error_while_updating_data: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again.
to_explore_full_potential_text: Did you know we also have a mobile app? Click below to download the Fynch app!
agree_to_terms_of_use: You must agree to the terms of use.
sent_email_to: We have sent a verification e-mail to
verify_email: Verify your e-mail address to proceed
unsupported_file_format: Unsupported file format. Please upload a JPEG, JPG or PNG image
email_exists: E-mail account already exists. Select Forgot password to create a new password.
wfh_already_selected: Day has already been selected as Work from home. Deselect Work from home to edit day
wfo_already_selected: Day has already been selected as Work from office. Deselect Work from office to edit day
could_not_match_email: We did not find a license connected to your e-mail address. If you received a code to sign up, enter it here.
cannot_mark_weekend_days: You cannot mark weekend days as Work from home or Work from office
cannot_addtrips_on_weekend_days: Adding business trips is not allowed on work from home days and/or weekend days.
submit_following_information: You are about to submit the following information
you_can_not_make_edits: After submitting, you cannot edit your data anymore. Tap proceed to submit your information for
email_already_in_use: This e-mail address is already in use for another account. Click Forgot password to request a new password.
cancelled_popup_request: This action was cancelled because another pop-up was open. Close the other pop-up to proceed.
invalid_oauth_provider: EmailAuthProvider is not supported for this operation. This operation only supports OAuth providers.
invalid_provider_id: The specified provider ID is invalid.
popup_blocked: Pop-up cannot be opened. It may have been blocked by the browser. Unblock and try again.
popup_closed_by_user: The pop-up was closed before the action could be finished. Please try again.
provider_already_linked: Another sign in method has been linked to this account.
user_not_found: The account was not found. It may have been deleted. Check if your e-mail address is correct and try again.
add_your_addresses_details: Go to My addresses in the menu on the left. In order to use this functionality, we need your home and office address.
select_mode_of_transport_details: Go to My vehicles in the menu on the left and select your commute modality.
add_a_personal_vehicle_details: You have chosen car, motorbike, moped or bicycle as your commute modality. Please add a personal vehicle of the same type on the My vehicles page so that we know the fuel type of your modality.
add_all_missing_details_text: We need some more information from you before you can use this functionality. Use the buttons on the left to add your home and office addresses on the My addresses page and select your commute vehicles on the My vehicles page. Do you normally commute using a car, bicycle, motorbike or moped? If so, don't forget to add a personal vehicle as well.
reset_email_is_sent: An email to reset your password has been sent.
password_validation: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character.
please_verify_your_email: Please verify your email address using the link in the verification e-mail.
select_date_from_calendar: Select date from calendar to view trips
calendar_button_suggestion: Select one of the buttons above to mark days as work from home or work from office. Deselect both buttons to view day details.
cannot_submit_current_month: It is not possible to submit your information for the current month.
submit_expense_validation: We are unable to process your information due to a missing home address. Add your information on the My addresses page.
how_many_people_travelling_together: How many people were travelling altogether?
allow_only_numbers: This field should have only numbers
greater_than_one: Number of people should be greater than 1
submit_the_registration: Enter your office and home working days for the period shown and submit the registration
